formattedAddress: 203 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 203 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Had a very tasty dinner here with a friend we got the tuna special and the bacon wrapped monkfish. Both were amazing and we shared a pear salad.  The crowd was not very diverse.  Towards the end of the meal, our wait stuff was nowhere to be found, and when the chef came out and asked everyone else how their meal was, they did skip our table but other than that it was quite a good experience, and would definitely return.

originalText.text: Best Martini in Manhattan and larger than all other restaurants in the area.  It's slightly more $ than others but worth it and a bigger pour. Le Zie has a restaurant and a side bar that is smaller and more intimate. During the Pandemic they put up a beautiful area for outdoor dining.  The food is delicious. They have  pre-fix lunches from 12-4 and a wk end brunch.  I've enjoyed everything i've had there including delicious grilled octapus, eggplant appetizer, oysters,  pasta's, tuna and more.   it's a special place and the service is always good ...thank you Lucja.

originalText.text:
Le Zie is a truly lovely local Italian restaurant, with some of the best and nicest employees that you'll find in the city (Lucio, Christian, Paula, Connie ... all amazing, as is everyone else).

Excellent food - the rigatoni, spaghetti & meatballs, linguini with clams, and lasagna are all great classic options, and the pasta specials are consistently great; the salt baked branzino, and braised lamb shank are both excellent, and the bar menu is great for a snack with a drink.

Different decor styles in each dining room create very different atmospheres to suit different moods, and the lounge area is a real hidden gem of a neighborhood cocktail bar - outstanding (and dangerously generous) martinis, and Manhattans, and the Ponte di Bassano is wonderful.

originalText.text: Lovely restaurant! Food is fresh. Wine list. Intimate small place! Love it!

text.text: Lovely restaurant! Food is fresh. Wine list. Intimate small place! Love it!

originalText.text: Side bar is perfect. Fantastic service and delicious food. Great wine list. 5 stars!!

text.text: Side bar is perfect. Fantastic service and delicious food. Great wine list. 5 stars!!
